name: Southfog - Alone in the Woods
description:
The woods around Southfog have many secrets. You never know what you're going to find on a camping excursion with a friend - but wait, your friend didn't quite show up. So now you are alone in the woods - or are you?

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a very short point and click adventure I made to help me learn how to use Visionaire Studio 5. It is unpolished, and lacks many features such as audio.

I completed it in six days as part of the Weekly Game Jam 84,  with the theme of "Alone".

Controls are with your mouse and left mouse button.
